 Mayor & City Council

Mayor & City Council
--------------------

**The Mayor and six at-large City Councilmembers are elected for 3 year terms.**  
Current members:  
**Mayor Ronald Weir**, current term expires May, 2028  
**Mayor Pro-tem Keith Mensch**, current term expires May, 2026  
**City Councilmember Clinton Bowman**, current term expires May, 2027  
**City Councilmember Joan Breith**, current term expires May, 2028  
**City Councilmember Rodney Hanneman**, current term expires May, 2027  
**City Councilmember Mark Sherman**, current term expires May, 2026  
**City Councilmember Brad Irons**, current term expires May, 2028  
  
[Election Information](https://denvercitytexas.org/elections.php)
